content.detailedDescription: Sat down in our backyard and immediately saw a bright green square light just south of us that lit up a palm tree, no sound.  thought it was a laser (you would see on a gun) it immediately disappeared. walked toward the tree it had lit up (the tree is in our neighbors yard, which is approximately 30feet about our yard.  we live on the mountain side) and moments later saw an orb, thought it was a shooting star until it changed directions multiple times then vanished.  we live next to a mountain & the flight plan of commercial planes are overhead so we're accustom to the flight traffic. you can see the bellies of every plane that flys over & their company logo.  this was nothing like we've seen before. neither one of us were believers until tonight.  it felt surreal, never panicked.
content.summary: Initially saw a bright green light shaped like a square then disappeared.  3 minutes later a white orb flew horizontally changing directions quickly.

content.detailedDescription: My 3 friends and i were out on the porch at 11:20pm at night, in oregon at my house and one of us noticed a flash among the stars. we all looked straight up and saw the flash again. when the flash came again i looked at another star right next to the flash to keep track and see if the object was moving. the flash came again in the same spot. the flashes were pretty bright and appeared to be at a very high altitude. the flashes continued coming every 12 seconds or so, and the source creating the light flashes was not moving at all in comparison to the stars in the sky. after 4 or 5 minutes of this, and about 20 or 30 flashes, one final flash came that was very bright. this all happened in the same stationary spot and after that final flash we did not see it again. we continued staring for at least 10 minutes but it did not come back.
content.summary: Stationary flashing light directly above us

content.detailedDescription:
Working on a lovely evening clear skies seeing normal flights on normal route, was welcoming a customer in when out of no where was a bright and very noticeable to the eye circle bright white light no extra normal plane lights with the white and red lights u see on normal passenger planes, 
have to say so glad i had my phone so i could get a few secs of what we saw so i'm still confused so as my work collage is and a few customers but please someone  let me know after these two videos what have we seen?????
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Amazing light and unbelievable movement still a bit stunned

content.detailedDescription: I got information that october 8th and 9th would be a great time to see shooting stars and i actually saw one then i notice a bright flickering star that was stationary so i got out my bushnell night vision monacular and watch this thing change shapes first it was like the moon then change to half a moon shape but the bottom half was missing then it change like a square piece was taking out of the circle sometimes a small square sometimes a bigger square piece is taken out. so i called my daughter lauren and let her watch and she thought that was strange too.So i have some pics and video that i took with my night vision monocular.
content.summary: I was looking for shooting stars and and i notice a bright small object that kept changind shapes.

content.detailedDescription: At home star gazing on 3 different sightings where i seen red orbs, riding my bike to local town in the middle of the day where i seen a silver orb (mirrored) on another sighting and a blue and red orb type craft twice (may have been 2 different crafts) also a bright white light near the local power station when on a bat walk with a group of people. i am ex army air corps where i worked with aircraft almost every day and live in a busy fly zone, but know that each of my sightings wasn't any known man made craft.
content.summary: 4 different craft types (lights) seen over the year.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i frequently drive out to the wheat fields surrounding moscow, id, to watch the stars at night. we had never observed anything that we couldn't explain until about 6 weeks ago. we were leaning on my car, watching the stars, and an orb appeared about 500 feet to my right, that drifted slowly northwest, then disappeared. it was only visible for about 3 seconds. i yelled "what the hell is that" to my boyfriend, and he didn't see it because it disappeared to fast. i told him to get in the car, and that i wanted to go home. he made fun of me, and told me it was probably farm equipment or a shooting star.  the next night, we decided to go out to the same place in the wheat fields to watch the stars again. i was curious to see if anything would appear that night, too. about a minute after we got there, an orb appeared over the wheat fields, slowly moved east, and then hovered over the ground for about 2 minutes, then disappeared. my boyfriend witnessed this one, but was still skeptical, and still tried to explain it away as being "farm equipment." we decided to drive further down the road to another location. we stopped about half a mile away, and another light appeared less than 100 yards away from the car, hovering over a small hill. it didn't move, but disappeared after about 30 seconds. this is how our fascination with the "lights" in the sky near our house began. since then, we have observed strange lights almost every night we've gone out. there are ones that appear like the lights described above, but there have been other strange occurrences happen recently too. we observed a "fuzzy" appearing star-like light in the sky that slowly moved from north to south, would stay stationary, then move west, east, then continue south. i commute 30 minutes to work each day, and when i come drive home around 9 pm, i have seen other strange things in the sky. i have seen strobing lights that move slowly across the sky. they don't look like lights from a plane. a few nights, i've seen 3-4 of these types of lights while making the 30 mile commute home from lewiston, id, to moscow, id. i have also seen a quick flash of light from the sky that disappears in less than 1 second, and then a few seconds later, another flash will occur in a different part of the sky. i've finally decided to take to the internet to try and see if anyone else in my area has also been seeing these things. the strangest one that happened, was literally right outside my house in my driveway. we had rented a movie and were returning home, when we saw one of the "strobing" lights in the east sky right before we turned onto our street. when we got home, we got out of the car, and i saw a light in the west sky that appeared to be about 200 feet up. it was slowly coming towards. i pointed it out to my boyfriend, and we watched as it literally came straight towards us. as it got close to us, it started to dim, and completely disappeared right as it was overhead. we are both working professionals, don't have any history of mental illness, and don't use any substances.  the only other time i've seen anything similar to these lights was as a teenager in spalding, id. my family and i saw some lights one summer that would move back and forth in the sky, and would split into 2-3 lights, then reabsorb back into one light. that was at age 14, and i'm now almost 28. i've literally seen nothing weird since that time until 6 weeks ago. if anyone else in the area has seen these lights, i'd love to hear about it. i'm now fascinated with them, and want to know what they are. feel free to leave me your contact information. i do have some videos of some of these occurrences, although they're poor quality cellphone videos.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Several different types of lights observed near moscow, id

content.detailedDescription: Sightings were the same as observed on 10/6 though 10/8.  see previous reports.
content.summary: Lights appeared in western sky, hovered then moved northward then southeast

content.detailedDescription:
About 23:30 we arrived home and as usual i looked at the sky to just watch constellations that i can recognise, then instantly i saw several flashing starlike dots aligned in an exact line and i knew there is no such constellation. i looked more carefully and i saw a non glowing object at the beginning of the alignment line which looked like a jet or airplane. i counted the flashing dots following the jet-like object and they were 11. flashing most of them with blueish light and one of them flashing red light. their movement along the jet-like object was like a kite; floating together like they have string attached to them.
i grabbed my camera and tried to capture them. when you zoom in the jet like object it is actually two triangles forming a lung shape.(file: img_0204(1) ) it looked so much like military uavs but in an alien way. but the 11 flashing objects are not clear enough to see what they are. in one of the best pictures i could only see that one of them is a rectangular shaped red-green flashing thing.(file: img_0208)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: A two-triangled object following by 11 flashing dots in an aligned line with a kite like movement.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking the dogs out one last time before bedtime, and i always look at the stars. last night, i saw a very large array of blinking lights moving eastward. i'm thinking it had to be very large because it seemed far away and behind some clouds, and was still wide, i'm thinking maybe 100 feet or so. there were approximately 8 lights, and the color was a faded pink. the lights seemed to be in the shape of a boomerang, or a wide "v". it was going behind a cloud and was extremely hard to see. i called my husband out, but it had gone behind the clouds so much that he didn't see it. i had no time to grab a camera, as it had disappeared shortly after that. i am used to seeing airliners, coast guard helicopters, c130's, even the occasional blimp, and this sighting was nothing like that.
content.summary: A large array of blinking lights, all moving together as if one object.

content.detailedDescription:
Bio: i am a united states navy veteran, i am a university graduate, i am a career los angeles police officer and ended my law enforcement career as a united states federal chief of police. i have traveled the world many times over. my mentally and intellectual faculties are as sound as you can get based on my professional background and governmental professional responsibilities.

facts:  i own a home in a mountain forest community at 6,500’ elevation outside of los angeles, ca. i have a clear and unfettered view of the clear blue skies in and around my home.  my adult daughter (university graduate summa cum laude criminal justice)) and myself were sitting on my deck outside of my home. absolutely clear blue skies, no clouds, slight breeze, no haze, and no adverse weather conditions whatsoever. as we were talking we were watching the commercial jets above that were cruising by some from 12,000 to 30,000 plus based on the con trails.  i happened to look straight up, and i observed a unique looking shinny object tear-drop shaped ufo hovering approximately 12 + thousand feet above.  it appeared about the same size as a commercial aircraft and about the size of a dime.  (very difficult to determine the exact altitude but appeared as large as a commercial jetliner)my daughter joined me in the observation…a neighbor across the street said hey ….”is that a ufo” confirming our observation. i grabbed two sets of high-end binoculars. we all clearly observed the hoovering silent craft. it was a shimmering gold color with a slight minor haze as if was vibrating or giving off some energy.  it was shaped like a tear drop, a pointed nose and a rounded aft. with the binoculars i could clearly see the entire perimeter of the craft and it had darker edges than the rest of the craft, the darker edges also were shimmering.  the simmering effect resembled that of a desert heat mirage.  we all watched this ufo for about 45 minutes….It was not party balloons! it was not a weather balloon! it was not a helicopter! it was not a stealth bomber, it was not a plane or harrier jet. it was not a bird... it hovered.....Then after about 45 minutes of our observation, it moved slowly to the west and at that time my daughter and my vantage point lost sight of the ufo in the tall pines.  at my neighbor’s vantage point he observed the ufo to hover for the entire time and he said that he seen it depart instantaneously…..It was there then it split to the west as a mere faint streak....Poof! gone...  no further details.
content.summary: Tear drop shape, pointed on front, rounded rear with slight point, metallic shimmer in gold color with slight haze, entire perimeter had darker edge in a circular pattern

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving with my wife and young daughter along a long stretch of road not too far from our home on our way to a family members. there was moderate traffic and people walking around and i looked out of my top left corner of my front windscreen and saw a jet black triangular object about the size of a golf ball high in the sky about the height that planes fly i thought it was some kind of plane at first but it was still or almost still in the sky. as soon as i laid eyes on the object began moving in the opposite direction to which i was driving. i then shouted to my wife "look what is that!?" and she could not see it at first and as soon as she spotted it the object instantly changed direction and also at the same time began to morph into different shapes from disc to sphere almost pulsating in between the transformations and began flying along side our vehicle whilst it was still at the same height. i pulled over and got out my phone to record it and it began to hover above my car staying around my area and as i tried to record i hit the picture button i took a picture by accident and i got a picture and as i slid across to change to video mode my screen on my phone went black and my phone was unresponsive for at least 1-2 minutes and when my phone came back on the ufo was no longer in sight. during the sighting me and my wife were very excited and at the same time shocked and amazed close to the end of the sighting we began to feel very dizzy and nausious. i carried on my route to the family members house which led through a wooded area and there was an opening in the trees where my wife then saw a classic flying saucer shaped obect with bright lights and a highly reflective surface the lights were  all the way around it i did not see this ufo but when we came to another opening in the trees my wife lost sight of it. at this point my wife was just in absolute shock and she was abit nervous. we then saw a large black or dark plane flying by we were unsure if this was a military plane or not. i have include two pictures of the object one is fully zoomed out and the other is fully zoomed in.
thanks for your time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Driving and pulled over ufo was flying in opposite direction once observed changed in opposite direction and was changing shape

content.detailedDescription: I walked out of my door and glanced over at the moon, it was a crescent, it looked nice. i looked again and noticed three orbs around it. i thought it was some sort of ufo when i first saw it, what else could it be? the three orbs were moving slightly when i first noticed them, i took out my phone to get some sort of footage of this incident, so i took out my phone, and tried to get on the camera app, i looked back up at the moon to see if they were still there, and they zoomed across the sky over to the south east, and faded out rather quickly. i wasn't able to get a picture or video of the orbs in time.
content.summary: I noticed orbs in the sky, i tried to take a picture with my phone, but they flew away.

content.detailedDescription: Im not sure of year but i was like 8 or 9 years of age at the time.  i was sitting on my front porch drinking a soda about 8pm waiting for parents to come home.  i noticed this really bright light north of town and it was quite large.  it hung there for over an hour and other folks came out of there house and i yelled at there kids to look at the light. about an hour later it went out with out moving.  then i look up and going above the house about 500 feet up is a flying wedge type object with about 11 lights that were gray in color.  i read the paper next day and it said it was pidgeons lit up by city lights.  thought that was funny do to the fact we lived about 6 miles outside the city.  i watch your show hoping to see something on this.  never have.  was hoping you had something on this cause it was a sight to see and one you don't forget.    thanks for your time
content.summary: Bright ball then a flying wedge

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the town of stykkisholmur, iceland from outside the hotel stykkisholmur after breakfast around 8 am gmt. there wasn't anything unusual..It was only after i had returned home to india from my trip and downloaded the pictures from camera to computer that i noticed the strange lights in the picture. i do wish i had noticed them then.
content.summary: Only noticed the lights when the photo was downloaded from my camera onto the computer

content.detailedDescription: It was august the 3rd at 3:06 a.M.  we were having a meteor shower that late night, so we decided to sit out in the back of the truck to observe them. while the time went by we noticed a shadow moving above us. we all got a glimpse of it, at first i thought it was a bird flying above us going west.  but my aunt said that birds really do not fly at night. she also said that if i wanted to see a ufo, just to talk to them mentally and ask them to come back. so i did this. i was just shooting random pictures in the direction that the shadow went. at the time of this event i had a sony phone, that is what i was using while taking pictures. i did not have a digital camera. i was using different apps on my phone for night pictures. i continue shooting all the pictures i could that night.  the next day my aunt uploaded my pictures onto her laptop and this is the picture that i caught on my phone. she has a picture that she took maybe about 2 to 3 years back, it was a night shot. in her picture there was a shape with lights, upon zooming in she noticed a ufo also. it has the same shape has this picture of mine. she put her picture in negative and you can see the shape really well. i'll send a copy of her's has well. my reaction to this picture was totally shocked. i never would have imagined that this would appear in my photos taken that night.  thank you for listening. [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: I never thought that i would capture a ufo ever in my life. i trully wanted to see one that night. not knowing that i had anything on my photos, i did not ever think that this could be real, but to me it is.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my wife were travelling in a car on highway 417 from montreal to ottawa around 11pm on october 4. about 30km behind us my brother inlaw drove in his car. out of thin air just south of ottawa a strange triangular/rectangular object appeared on our left side, flying and accelerating fast downwards towards the ground. it had 6-8 green sharp lights with a red one above the middle of the center of the green lights. it seemed to be flat in shape as it rotated slightly towards the ground, like a falling leaf. against the illuminated background of ottawa lights i could determine a dark solid surface, as if the lights were attached to this surface, seeing it from below.

three people observed this from two different cars, car behind us was about 30km behind. he reported that he saw it as a fast moving green light on his left side. i estimate the speed was 200 km/h and size at least 15 metres from back to tip. we travelled about 100km/h and the object flew about twice that speed. the whole experience lasted only 5 seconds. 

we were both amazed by what we'd seen. never scared just totally fascinated by this as we never seen a ufo before. i am pretty sure it was not a plane, but possibly a military drone or atmospherical phenomena. but deep in my mind i think this was something else. it's been some days since we came back to our country but i couldn't stop thinking about it and started googling and finding this site, deciding i had to report it.
content.summary: Triangular shape with 6-8 lights moved fast from south to north on my left side

content.detailedDescription:
Woke up at 3am saw a bright flash which is what woke me.
the flash was as if i had just been punched sudden so that may have been me having a dream.
i always leave the curtains open so i looked out of the window it was very dark but clear sky as the moon was very bright in its crescent form.
i saw what i thought was a very bright star too bright for normal star. and guessed it may well be the iss. however it moved rapidly and stopped, being i had just woken i just checked my self thinking i didn’t see that. but it went off again very quick no particular path or direction just sort of a little dance.
i got my phone out and got it on video record and when i found the object again picked it up on my screen as a very bright white light.
i followed its dance as best i could for a little while until it became stationary and i also picked up the moon along side it.
it didn’t seem to move any more so i switched off and went back to sleep.
the video is shaky and appears upside down as i grabbed my phone quickly.
sorry if you find its a waste of time.
content.summary: Woke at 3am bright flash got phone out and recorded it went back to sleep when stationary

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my morning walk in the neighborhood i live in. at 7:25 am on 10-8-2015 as i came to an intersection, i looked up and saw a plane exhaust trail and under it this object. i stopped, and the object stopped..It was stationary. no lights, no sound. i turned left in the intersection and the object seemed to move right following the direction of the plane trail. i stopped again, it stopped. i took a couple of steps, stopped. and the object stopped. i would stand still each time i stopped to see if the object would keep moving right, following the trail, but it seemed stationary. i did not see it move.  as i continued watching and looking back over my shoulder the object seemed to be moving as if it was again following the trail. it seemed white and shining from the sun hitting it. it looked like it was sort of oval/oblong and that there were two large "holes" in it. it did not make any sounds, did not give off an exhaust trail. possibly it was a drone, that is what friends and said, but if it was it was large. not handheld size, but had to be at least small aircraft size.
content.summary: Observed object

content.detailedDescription: Looked out front window 9:45 , saw blue light move from left to right , up and down and dissapear. i am not sure if it was one or more. very fast moving.
content.summary: Looked out front window saw a blue object, up and down spin and plinked.

content.detailedDescription:
Watching the night sky i witnessed a bright red light hovering just sw of my location. a few seconds later it began to slowly move w, occasionally moving backwards. i immediately went to grab my binoculars. when i got a closer look it was a cone shape craft with a red orb light on the bottom.Also, from the time i went from my front yard to the back yard, it seemed to have moved further away in a matter of a few seconds.

 i observed this, along with my wife, until it disappeared behind some trees along the horizon.
content.summary: Bright red light movinf sw to w

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the sky with my son, suddenly i felt like if someone was looking at me so i turn my head to the beach, and there they were, above the beach, and remained stationary for a while and when we stood up and approach to the other side of the roof with the camera they began to play with us, we called the rest of the family to see it, my son in law and one of my daughters came up with us,  it was there more than 13 minutes. going from one place to another, horizontal and vertical, moves that cant make any plane/helicopter. flashing and glowing in red/orange colors.  then they headed to the north and disappeared in the distance.  came back later, about half an hour, this time by the west. but just for few seconds before it got cloacked again.  they flashed at us, they were on route to the ocean.

in the video im posting, there are many lights, the white one that moves in a constant rythm is a lighthouse,  the big one is a street light pole, theres another at the top of the building to mark the height.

the ships i get on video appear very small on video, but they are big at normal sight, many times we can see their lights very clear, red, white, blue or green, some lights are in circle, others are in triangle shape, some are around the middle and others at the bottom, centered but spinning.  the sphere shape ships do not have lights, they glow and are silver/white color. they tend to come during the day,  disc shape ships always at night.  the only triangle shape ships that we had seen are always black, and always around the moon. we had a telescope, now we have binoculars, very easy to see them during full moon
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Watching the sky with my son, suddenly it appeared above the beach and began to play with us, we called the rest of the family to see it

content.detailedDescription: It was around 8-9 o'clock at night. i was outside in my backyard and i was looking at the stars. after a little while of walking around, i looked at the sky again and a bright, orb like...Thing was in the sky and it was so bright compared to the other stars. in fact, it pretty much made the stars appear to be dull. i was really confused and i was assuming it might of been a plane but i wasn't convinced at all. it was too big to be a plane or star. it seemed still but when i looked at it closely, i noticed that it was slowly moving. kind of like a slight hovering movement. at this point i was really freaked out and a dull static noise began to grow in my ears. it was getting to the point where i looked away and rubbed my ears to soothe them (due to my autism, i have sensitive hearing). after the static died down(maybe around 20 seconds or so, i looked back up at the sky and the orb was on the other side of my peripheral vision. i ended up getting really spooked, so i ran back inside. unfortunately, i didn't have a camera or phone with me.
content.summary: I saw a bright orb like object in the sky and it moved very quickly.

content.detailedDescription:
Firstly, please understand that my memories of this are those of a child.  there were many people who saw this, but sadly, most of them have now passed away.  i have never been able to find any newspaper mention of this incident, which leads me to wonder, as an adult, if it was "hushed up" by the military.

my older brother and i, along with many others, were playing at lakebottom park on a summer evening in the early "50s".  suddenly there was a "saucer shaped" object above us, at tree-top height, and it proceeded to circle lakebottom at least once, maybe twice, and then disappeared as suddenly as it had appeared.  some boys that my brother knew came running up from the area of a softball game in progress at the other end of lakebottom, screaming "did you see it?"  the exterior seemed to be dark gray or black, non reflective material, with a soft blue glow around it, and maybe, possibly a humm sound with it.  i am now in my seventies, and still wonder what it was that we saw, and if i'll ever find out!

any help solving my "mystery" would be appreciated!
content.summary: Saucer shaaped object circling "lakebottom" area.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching tv and i was telepathically told to go look at the sky. i looked at the sky westward and immediately saw the craft and the orb. the craft was lower than the orb and was emitting light pulses to the orb. i took my phone and snapped a picture. you can see the craft and the light pulses going up but you can't see the orb. the next thing i know i'm waking up on my couch and i thought to myself that i dreamt the sighting. i remember taking the photo so i grabbed my phone and the picture was there. i was sick to my stomach and felt warm all over my skin was red. i felt a feeling of doom.
now i'm coming forward for the first time in my life because i need serious help. i've been being abducted since age nine. my first experience with abduction was in late summer i was nine years old playing worth my best friend in the woods by her house. we were exploring and found to dead baby horses. i remember they had parts cut off them but there was no clear reason why they should be dead. no injuries.. nothing. we got really scared and next i remember my hair got all staticy and the hair on the back of my neck stood up. then we saw this metallic silver orb perfectly round and it looked totally solid. and this orb was hovering above us and we started running for our lives. next thing i remember is waking up on my friends bed and she was also next to me. we said nothing to each other until years later when we reunited and i asked her if she remembered the orb and the baby horses. she said yes it was real and it happened. 
over the years i've known something was happening but never remembered what. however, i couldn't deny that when i lost time something always appeared on my body. a cut, a mark and scars that appeared from nowhere. note for the last three years i've suffered so much with lesions that won't heal and strange things that come out of the lessons. sometimes strange living creatures. i know this sounds so crazy but it's true. my hair texture has changed and i find weird structures in my hair. intricacy in knots and strange black hairs that move and my hair acts as of its alive as well. i have proof of all this as i've documented and have numerous samples of the strange structures that comes out of the lesions as well as strange scabs and fibers that move. i know this sounds crazy but it's not when you have proof.. and i do. i'm coming forward now because i'm scared as my health is starting to be effected and i feel far older than i am. that's all i have for you note.
content.summary: Was watching tv was like i was telepathically told to go look at the sky. saw the craft and orb took a picture and lost time woke up on my couch.

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 1980 myself and  my best friend at the time were sitting on the front porch step on irving ave. in the town of bridgeton new jersey. it was in the early evening thirty minutes before dusk. as we were sitting on the front step talking i happened to look down the street and noticed the object that was passing very slowly over the roof of the bridgeton hospital which was about 3 city blocks from where we were sitting i qiuckly said to my friend nelson what is that! as i pointed at the object to nelson my brain was quickly trying to identify it i said its not a plane  because it had no wings, its not a helecopter no blades. its not a blimp. it was no more than twenty ft above the hospital roof. moving so slowly. we were so excited that  i said to nelson lets go to check it out. we immediately jumped off the steps ran out the yard and down the st. towards the object. as we were running as fast as we could towards it i could clearly see it was a ufo silver in color. and round disc shape. as we were running towards it i could see that it was turning in direction slightly and if we continued running down irving ave that we we miss it directly so i estimated that in order to get a closer look at the ufo i would have to change directions and start running up another st named church st. i did that and got about a quarter  block up the st. then i decided to stop and wait to see the ship fly over me. as soon as i stop i looked up and it appeared as luck would have it i was now directly underneath  the ufo as it slowly moved no more than 20  to 30 feet above the houses roof tops. i was amazed because it made no sound nothing. it was matalic  silver in color with multi colored lights under it that were not blinking at all. it was so close to me i remember saying i could have  it it with a rock. i was only 20 years old at the time along with my friend nelson.I distinctly remember thinking that it was heading in the direction of the salem 1&2 nuclear power plant which was only about 20 miles or less away from were we lived at the time.The interesting thing about this is because my friend nelson and i have kinda both moved on with our lives and not been in touch that much, i really love to talk with him about that incident to see and compare our story about what we both saw that day back 1980. to this day i feel so lucky in my mind knowing that i personally witnessed seeing a ufo! and i am very content knowing that we are not alone.
content.summary: My friend and i observed a ufo at roof top level for about three minutes in the summer of 1980.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in my bed about to go to sleep, when i looked out my bedroom window which is facing west and i saw what i thought to be an airplane, however it was hovering not moving or getting bigger or smaller. i noticed the object because i was lookong at the tress across the street and saw it above it (not actually above it was further away but from my perspective it was above the tree line). i couldnt tell the shape bur it didnt seem flat in seemed fmlonger up and down than side to side, atleast from my angle. it was flashing red yellow and white lights randomly and very bright, not blinding bright but too bright for a plane. then is started to move south however it stopped flashing yellow, it dimmed reddish and then started flashing white and reddish. it was flashing in pattern after it started moving. i lost sight of the object when it went past my house over the room that i could see from my room. also when it flew away it wasnt super fast but it was fast. towards the end of it being in my sight a plane more north and higher was flying and they looked similar but not identical the ufo just seemed off. i know what planes in the sky look like and there was something different about this object . i immediately called my friend after i couldn't see if anymore and she didnt answr. i was scared and nervous because i've never seen something like this and i didn't know what to expect. i couldnt tell anyone in the house because they were all sleeping.
content.summary: I saw flashing lights hovering for a while then it flew away.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were walking our golden retriever about 11:30 p.M. on 10-05-15. we were in the desert area across the street from our rv park here in bullhead city, arizona. i looked up to admire the stars and noticed a red and yellow-orange light moving south-southwest following the colorado river. absolutely no sound. no prop wash, engine noise, no aircraft marker lights, nothing. it was approximately 800'-1000' up in the night sky. may have been closer, at night it's difficult to be sure. the lights appeared to blink once in awhile but no pattern. it continued south-southwest until it encountered a cloud bank and disappeared. moments later another appeared in the northern sky and followed the same path as the first. our dog was not disturbed at all. really strange.
content.summary: Light in the sky traveling south southwest

content.detailedDescription: I went out this evening to take pictures of the sunset and the clouds and seen several different objects in my photo's that could not otherwise be seen. one photo really caught my attention because i have no idea what it is. i could not explain it by saying maybe it was a plane or a bird.
content.summary: Found in photo's

content.detailedDescription: Pulsating object slightly larger than the stars in sky appearing and disappearing and performing moves such as 90 degree turns which seem impossible might sound weird but object appeared to know i was watching it and disappeared accordingly. helicopter noises heard coming in area about 3 min after sighting
content.summary: Pulsating object

content.detailedDescription:
I wouldn't like to disclose any information about my school, but i was at my high school when we were sent outside during a fire drill.
while walking, i saw my first ufo. it was descending, quickly, and it looked like an silver extremely reflective oval. it was not an airplane, because it was wingless, quiet, and didn't leave a mark in the sky. my sister witnessed it as well. it then ducked under the trees and we couldn't spot it anymore. 
then, while we were all in lines, i spotted the second ufo. it looked like the first, except was red on one side and blue on the other. i looked away and i couldn't spot it anymore.
i kept asking my classmates what they thought it was, and all of them annoyed by my persistant asking and excitement, didn't answer. of course, i got the normal responses of "it's probably just a plane" or "drone maybe?". one girl suggested it was the rocket that was launched by nasa in virginia, but it very clearly wasn't that because it didn't leave streaks in the sky. it was too high up to be a drone as well.
the last one, was the most frustrating. it was a red wingless object, but with the tail of an airplane. it didn't make streaks in the sky and didn't make a noise, so i knew it wasn't an airplane. if it was an airplane, we'd hear it because of the altitude of the object.
it was very reflective. i saw it during the fire drill, but then lost track of it. while walking back inside, i spotted it again.
then, later, for theatre class, we were sent outside to practice our pieces. i spotted the red object again. it was come from the right side of the sky, and would disappear in the middle. i saw it repeat these patterns 4 times, continuously telling the people around me.
they all thought i was crazy, they couldn't see it. until finally, they all witnessed it the last time before we came inside.
they all started to believe me, since it came from the exact direction i told them and disappeared in the middle of the sky. 

for all of the ufos, there were multiple witnesses. it's hard to tell how many since the whole school was outside, and who even knows how many people even looked at the skies during it. it was very strange.
unfortunately, i didn't have my phone with me during the drill, so i couldn't take pictures.
i am praying that other people saw these objects and i'm not being delusional.
content.summary: 3 ufos witnessed during firedrill
